<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">London</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">London</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Londres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Londres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Londra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λονδίνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Londres</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This learning units gives guidelines to learners & teachers in writing and assesing a project using language & writing skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">London</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">writing skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geographical location</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses erlernenmaßeinheiten gibt den Anfängern 
u. den Lehrern im Schreiben Korrekturlinien und das Assesing ein 
Projekt mit Sprache u. Fähigkeiten schreibend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci les unités d'étude donne des directives aux
étudiants et aux professeurs dans l'écriture et assesing un projet 
en utilisant le langage et écrivant des qualifications.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto unidades de aprendizagem dá guidelines aos 
learners & aos professores na escrita e assesing um projeto usando a 
língua & escrevendo habilidades.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò unità imparanti dà la guida di riferimento 
ai principianti & agli insegnanti nella scrittura ed assesing un 
progetto usando il linguaggio & scrivendo le abilità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μονάδες αυτής της εκμάθησης δίνουν τις οδηγίες 
στους αρχαρίους & στους δασκάλους που γράφουν και poy εγγράφως 
ένα πρόγραμμα χρησιμοποιώντας τη γλώσσα & γράφοντας τις 
δεξιότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto las unidades que aprenden da guías de 
consulta a los principiantes y a los profesores en la escritura y 
assesing un proyecto usando lenguaje y escribiendo habilidades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">London</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geographischer Standort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Londres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">emplacement géographique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Londres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades da escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">posição geográfica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Londra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità di scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">posizione geografica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λονδίνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες σύνταξης εγγράφου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωγραφική θέση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Londres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de la escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">localización geográfica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
